articles.title: Artificial Intelligence Reveals First-Ever Image of Unseen Parts of the Sun - Newsweek
articles.description: The AI acts as a "virtual observatory," extrapolating the solar polar regions' appearance from neighboring areas we have imaged.
articles.content:
The Sun's poles—which have never been seen before—have been revealed for the first time by what experts are calling a "virtual observatory."
